task.title: Using the main menu
task.shortdesc: The Chats screen is the default view when you log in. It displays all conversations that you currently have open.

context.p:
Chats with the most recent activity are displayed at the top of the list. Chat with new incoming messages are displayed at the top of the list with a badge indicating they are unread messages in the chat. For each chat in the list the following details are displayed:
The photo or default avatar of the chat partner
The name of the chat partner or the topic for a group chat and status information
The time of the last message on the conversation
The last message received or sent on the conversation
The number of unread messages for the conversation if applicable
The badges associated with chat settings

Tap the menu icon in the upper left side or slide left to display the menu item. From the menu, you can:
Access documentation
Change your online status
Log out
Manage and join meetings
Manage your contacts
Manage app settings
Manage recordings
Obtain information about the product
Report a problem and access logs
Work with your active chats
